mapper.insert:
/*insPayAppData*/ INSERT CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP ( PAY_APP_TYPE, PJT_NM, PJT_SN, BUDGET_NM, BUDGET_SN, APP_DE, APP_TITLE, APP_CONT, BNK_SN, BNK_NM, ACC_NO, ACC_NM, PAY_APP_STAT, GUBUN, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{payAppType}, #{pjtNm}, #{pjtSn}, #{budgetNm}, #{budgetSn}, #{appDe}, #{appTitle}, #{appCont}, #{bnkSn}, #{bnkNm}, #{accNo}, #{accNm}, #{payAppStat}, 'W', #{regEmpSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PAY_APP'
mapper.update: /*updPayAppData*/ UPDATE CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP SET PAY_APP_TYPE = #{payAppType}, PJT_NM = #{pjtNm}, PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}, BUDGET_NM = #{budgetNm}, BUDGET_SN = #{budgetSn}, APP_DE = #{appDe}, APP_TITLE = #{appTitle}, APP_CONT = #{appCont}, BNK_SN = #{bnkSn}, BNK_NM = #{bnkNm}, ACC_NO = #{accNo}, ACC_NM = #{accNm}, PAY_APP_STAT = #{payAppStat}, MOD_DT = NOW(), MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq} WHERE PAY_APP_SN = #{payAppSn}
mapper.select: /*getPayAppReqData*/ SELECT A.*, B.DOC_NO FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP A LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO B ON A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID WHERE PAY_APP_SN = #{payAppSn}
/*getPayAppFinalData*/ SELECT A.*, B.DOC_NO FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP A LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO B ON A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID WHERE A.PAY_APP_SN = #{payAppSn} AND A.DOC_STATUS = 100
mapper.insert: /*insPayAppDetailData*/ INSERT CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP_DET ( PAY_APP_SN, EVID_TYPE, TR_CD, CRM_NM, CRM_BNK_NM, CRM_ACC_NO, CRM_ACC_HOLDER, TR_DE, TOT_COST, SUP_COST, VAT_COST, CARD, ETC, ISS ) VALUES ( #{payAppSn}, #{evidType}, #{trCd}, #{crmNm}, #{crmBnkNm}, #{crmAccNo}, #{crmAccHolder}, #{trDe}, #{totCost}, #{supCost}, #{vatCost}, #{card}, #{etc}, #{iss} )
mapper.select:
/*getPaymentList*/ SELECT A.*, B.DOC_NO, (SELECT SUM(TOT_COST) FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP_DET WHERE PAY_APP_SN = A.PAY_APP_SN) AS TOT_COST FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP A LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO B ON A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID
A.DOC_STATUS = #{docStatus}
